commit.message:
ref_neg.cc: Remove dg-excess-errors, fix dg-error markup.

2011-06-10  Jason Merrill  <jason@redhat.com>

	* testsuite/20_util/bind/ref_neg.cc: Remove dg-excess-errors,
	fix dg-error markup.

From-SVN: r174906
